name: YouTube Player Sizes
description:
This style changes the YouTube player sizes from *360p and 480p* to *480p and 720p*.

Great for people who wants to watch 720p videos without going fullscreen.
additional_info:
*YouTube now changed its player sizes, you won't need this style anymore."

03/08/2012: Now works with VEVO videos.
04/04/2012: Updated for the new YouTube code structure.
27/11/2012: Now works with new YouTube layout.
22/03/2013: Updated to work with new YouTube code structure.
15/08/2013: Updated to work with new YouTube code structure.

Known Issues:

- Doesnt' currently work with the HTML5 player.
- Doesn't work well with VEVO videos. Though it shows the correct size of the video, the background is still messy. Deactivate the style while watching VEVO videos if it bothers you.
